name: spwm-motor-control
description: Smooth FOC like control with torque and speed control.

scripts.smoother-file: node ./speed-control/closed-loop/AS5147P/teensy40/programs/smoother_error_ception.js -a localhost -p 9000 -n udp -c ./speed-control/closed-loop/AS5147P/teensy40/esc/graph_configs/kalman_control.json -o localhost -x 9002 -v udp -w 109 -f step-collect-${npm_config_run_id}.csv
scripts.step-collect-director: kaepek-io-director -i keyboard network=localhost,9001,udp -c stop start reset thrustui16 directionui8 -p console serial --sink network=localhost,9000,udp
scripts.step-collect-program: kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 0  && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w start && sleep 10 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 20000 && sleep 1 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 30000 && sleep 1 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 40000 && sleep 1 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 50000 && sleep 1 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w thrustui16 -d 60000 && sleep 3 && kaepek-io-netsend -h localhost -p 9001 -n udp -w stop
scripts.step-collect-analyse: npm run step-collect-detector --run_id=${npm_config_run_id} > help && npm run step-collect-file-graph --run_id=${npm_config_run_id}
